name: @resize
description: Emitted when parent element's size changes.

description.content: The object containing size information of the parent element.

{
   top: 0,
   right:  0,
   bottom:  0,
   left:  0,
   width:  0,
   height:  0,
   x: 0,
   y: 0,
   offsetHeight: 0,
   offsetWidth: 0,
   scrollHeight: 0,
   scrollWidth: 0
}
